entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Edson
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:55 PM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -3.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Edson Airport 4:06 PM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -3.1°C
Pressure: 101.1 kPa
Visibility: 8.1 km
Wind Chill: -5
Wind: ENE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023
